definition: dry land (as opposed to the sea)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: After leaving the smell of land behind him, he set his lines.
sentences.chinese: 在把陆地的气息抛在身后之后，他放下了钓丝。

sentences.english: In Hong Kong many square miles of land have been reclaimed from the sea.
sentences.chinese: 在香港，许多平方英里的陆地都是填海开拓出来的。

sentences.english: Billions years ago, human had moved from ocean to land and dominated the earth;
sentences.chinese: 亿万年后人从陆地走向森林，选择水岸。

sentences.english: She was glad to be on land again.
sentences.chinese: 她很高兴又回到陆地了。

sentences.english: Many high-gain stations will be deployed on land and ocean bottom.
sentences.chinese: 在陆地和洋底要设置许多高增益的台站。

sentences.english: USAF fixed and deployable ground command and control systems.
sentences.chinese: 美国空军固定和移动陆地指挥控制系统。

sentences.english: The findings could have applications back here on terra firma.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果或可以应用到陆地上的人们。

sentences.english: But you will find as much brutality by land.
sentences.chinese: 但你在陆地上也能找到同样多的暴虐。

sentences.english: Crocodiles can move very quickly over short distances on land.
sentences.chinese: 在陆地上，巨鳄可以迅速奔跑一段距离。

sentences.english: In humid conditions , it can survive on land for several days.
sentences.chinese: 在潮湿的环境中，攀鲈可于陆地上存活数天。

sentences.english: The invertebrate takes itsname from the equally flashy terrestrial anemone flower.
sentences.chinese: 它和陆地生物银莲花一样，得名于它的华丽。

sentences.english: Meat and dairy animals now account for about 20 percent of all terrestrial animal biomass.
sentences.chinese: 肉畜和乳畜目前占陆地动物生物总量的约20%。

sentences.english: When the plates move, the continents move with them.
sentences.chinese: 当板块移动的时候，陆地也会跟着移动。

sentences.english: I live on all the continents of the world except Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 我住在世界上除南极洲以外的所有的陆地上。

sentences.english: I live on all the continents except Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 除了南极洲，我住在世界上所有的陆地上。

sentences.english: This method is the same with the land case.
sentences.chinese: 该方法同时适用于海洋与陆地地震反射数据。

definition: shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
